cancel_reason=#{cancelReason},

mapper.select: select sum(case when status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as toBeConfirmed, sum(case when status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as confirmed, sum(case when status = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as deliveryInProgress from orders
